about_the_game:
Seagulls: Crappy Situation

An action-packed wave shooter with fast-paced game play and strategic survival elements. In this demo, you'll need to dodge aggressive seagulls while defending, cleaning, and expanding your raft. Sharpen your multitasking skills as you progress through increasingly difficult waves. The demo is limited to 15 minutes of game play.

At launch, this demo includes the following core game play features:

Tutorial section

Learn how to play the game by following the instructions from the Bottle, which guides you through navigation and basic mechanics.

Wave-based combat

Battle waves of seagulls, each with different classes, including tank-like birds and bomb-planters.

Raft expansion and management

Keep your raft afloat and clean, expanding it to survive longer against the waves. Purchase upgrades for raft protection and potions from the Merchant.

Explore underwater environment

Dive into the underwater world to find extra collectibles that might be helpful when you run out of feathers!

Path selection

Upon completing the tutorial, choose your play style to gain specific benefits, such as unique weapons, upgrades, potions, and raft protection upgrades.

Comedic, chaotic atmosphere

Enjoy humorous game play as you fend off seagulls in a lighthearted yet challenging environment.

This demo includes only the features available at launch and does not include any planned content for the full game. Stay tuned for future updates, but the current version focuses solely on the demo experience.

Recommended:

short_description: Seagulls: Crappy Situation is an action-packed adventure wave shooter full of hilarious bird-hunting, multitasking, and strategic micromanagement. Stay alive while dodging angry seagulls pooping on your raft, with comedic, rogue-like elements and no room for relaxation!
